passwordLengthRequired: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordCharacterRequired: Password must contain at least 3 of these: a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number, a special character (such as !@#$%^&*).
loginFailWrongEmail: Login failed, reason: Wrong email or password.
loginFailMaximumAttempts: Login failed, reason: Maximum number of sign in attempts exceeded.
